channel.title: I need your HELP
channel.description:
Hi, i got agspking source and i added dragon platebody model and added it in class8.java
And i added it in source in item.java
so when i log in and spawn dragon platebody its another item....AND (add model) dont working

item.title: I need your HELP
item.dc:creator: @michael_jackson michael jackson
item.description:
@michael_jackson wrote:

its because another item id is the same as the d plate id you added, happened with me a few times, try changing the id to something different etc 14000, then try compile and login and then say add model (modelid) for etc;

if(i == 8004) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925;
class8.anInt174 = 14104; //(Model ID is here) so for me it would be add model 14104
class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 14105;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 14105;//female wearing
class8.anInt164 = 14106;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = 14106;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Dragon platebody”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A Dragon PlateBody.”.getBytes();//examin info

after this close your client and compile and open again, should work
hope this worked for you. also it could be that when u added the model, there was a model already called that so if it says overwrite i’d do that.

Read full topic
